bio:
🗻Let the beauty of what you love, be what you do
👩🏼‍🏫 BSW | BEd student | #freshairandfreedom
🐶 Mom to @timber_tails
🌎 Want to join me in Peru?👇🏼

posts.caption:
10 days till I am done classes & 29 days till Christmas. Not like I’m counting or anything. Can’t wait for the adventures ahead over Christmas break 🙃 @eddiebauer #liveyouradventure #ebcontributor | Thanks @mddyelrck for the photo!
*
*
Any of yal get your Black Friday shopping done? I always seem to steer far away from it, but some deals are too good to pass up. @eddiebauer is continuing their sale onto today! 50% off your entire purchase - use code CYBER50 at check out.

I love meeting people and seeing the beauty in how they think. Those eyes that sparkle when they talk about the things they love. The beauty they have in their ability to make other people smile, leavin pieces of that sparkle everywhere they go. Those who are beautiful deep down to their soul ❤️
*
*
Can I rewind and go back to the weekend please? This photo was taken 24 hours prior too, and 50kms away from the last one I posted. How lucky am I to live somewhere that allows me to hike one day in these epic Spring like conditions, and then ski the next? All with such unreal views ❤️ I have seen photos from this spot countless times but this is the first time I’ve gone to capture it myself, with some help from @crp13 . Let’s just say it certainly lives up to all the hype @eddiebauer #liveyouradventure #ebcontributor

‘Mind the long caption’ ... What a day. Woke up -18 out. Whipped out the parka. Couldn’t find my car scraper so had to use a gift card. Couldn’t find my ear phones, so it was a musicless gym session this am. Roads are not good out there (drive safe this weekend people). Brought some more loads over to my new place - which is way smaller then the place I’m in but I feel it’s going to ‘force’ me to rid some stuff I def don’t need.
Though it ended so very well ❤️
*
*
I ran to Tim Hortons to get a coffee and potato wedges for Timber and I to share and a random you man in the parking lot (no one around) lookin freezing cold, waves me down... says ‘PLEASE, you don’t happen to have booster cables do you, and time to help me boost my car... I was working all day snow plowing roads - 14 hour day... left my car in the parking lot as another worker picked me up, and it won’t start’ I reply ‘100% of course I do! I’ll help ya’ ... He honestly thanked me 20x over saying he tried to flag down a number of vehicles and no ones stopped to help him. Blows my mind TBH, he said ‘I feel I don’t even look weird or unapproachable, why doesn’t anyone wanna help a person out’ especially in this cold. He insisted on taking my number to ‘repay’ me some how, all I said it please don’t worry about it just return the favour tothe next person... I drove through the drive through, placed my order, I get to the window and the guys standing outside insisting on paying for me. What a guy. What a day. #payitforward Time for some Netflix and perhaps a glass of wine? Oh and the photo... guess it really has nothing to do with this caption, I’m just dreaming of warmer days & a tan 🤣

EXCITED to announce that I have partnered up with @trovatrip and will be hosting a trip to Peru in July of 2019. And I want YOU to come along! If you are interested in joining me, head to the link in my bio to sign up for more info, along with trip alerts. The last time I went to Peru was in the fall of 2015, and I’ve been dying to go back since. What better way to do so then with a group of like minded adventurers ❤️
*
*
I posted about this in my story yesterday and had many questions regarding the itinerary, exact dates, fitness level required and more... these details are to come soon, this step in simply to gauge interest. Though I can tell you the itinerary we created for you is packed full of amazing adventures and experiences! Excited to see this trip come to life #peru #trovatrip

Oh hey 👋🏼 It’s me... It’s Friday!!!! And life is good. Welllll life’s pretty good everyday, but it’s been exceptionally good lately, for a variety of reasons. So grateful for a few wonderful opportunities that have come up, and those that see potential in me, the fact that there’s only a few weeks left of classes till Winter break (then I get a month off), and it’s Christmas, new activities I have been getting into and enjoying (aka climbing), having found a rad new place to live that I’ll be moving too in a couple weeks time, along with all the wonderful people in my life, and people whom I have recently connected or reconnected with, along with feelin a lot more ‘balanced’ in general... just to name a few things... and that’s all something to celebrate. Also stoked cause I am heading to the mountains on Sunday for two days of adventure, stayin at a little cabin, having some down time, AND hitting the slopes Monday afternoon at @sunshinevillage 🎿 . If anyone is planning on being on the hill that day, let me know 🙃 . Also a HUGE thanks to @christianschaffer for the portrait #freshairandfreedom #banff
It is in the true silence of nature where one will find true bliss - j.j.c @eddiebauer #EBcontributor #liveyouradventure | Thanks @nickrlake for this sneaky image you captured 💛

I was out for a run with Timber this morning and ran by four houses with their Christmas trees already up, in their front window, yay or nay? 🎄 When do you start to decorate!? Thanks @itsbigben for this photo 💙❄️ #freshairandfreedom #lakelouise

Want to join me in PERU!? 🇵🇪 ✌🏼Do you love adventure, laughter, good conversation and capturing moments along the way? Fancy that, so do I & maybe you wanna come come hang out with me and do just that 🙃 I have posted about it a couple times now, having partnered with @trovatrip to host a trip to Peru in July of next year, & all the details are finally up! Head to the link in my bio to check it out. An email went out to all of you who signed up for details and already a couple have committed to coming! Soooo stoked! ❤️❤️ If you have any questions at all feel free to email me or reach out to hi@trovatrip.com and we would be happy to help ya out! Lookin’ forward to adventuring with yal on the same side of the screen 🤗 #machupicchu #peru #trovatrip

GIVEAWAY time! I often get messages asking me what my favourite @eddiebauer jacket is, or piece of gear in general, and I always respond with, 'Hands-down it would be the Downlight Stormdown Hooded Jacket', which I have been wearing for years now, and have in multiple colours. When @eddiebauer asked me if I wanted to host a giveaway of my favourite piece of outerwear, I thought it would be the perfect opportunity to give you all a chance at winning this exact jacket! Entering is super easy, here’s what to do: *
*
1. Follow me, @brookewillson and @eddiebauer
2. Tag two friends below in the comments who love to adventure + the hashtags #EBGivesLove and #LiveYourAdventure
3. Do this within 48 hours
.

Good luck!

Be brave, be wild, and stay forever hungry, for love, art & adventures | Who has been to Kauai?! Or is planning on going? I had such an unreal time exploring the island with friends back in May! I wrote up a blog a few months ago, on our time spent there, hikes, recommendations, where we stayed etc. feel free to check it out! Link in my stories 🤗❤️ @keencanada #kauai #gohawaii
Be where you are, otherwise you will miss your life - Buddha @eddiebauer #EBcontributor #LiveYourAdventure

Who else spent their weekend on the hill!? Unreal day, kicking off this years ski season at @sunshinevillage | We took a few mini breaks at the top of the lifts to really soak in the views... Mount Assiniboine lookin’ like a beauty in the background. Thanks @crp13 for the long weekend company and the photo ✌🏼🎿☀️ #shredsv #sunshinevillage #banff *
*
Ps keep your eyes peeled later this evening as I am going to be releasing more details on my @trovatrip to Peru this coming Summer!!
